name: fem-pomodoro-app
description: Explore the Pomodoro App, a Frontend Mentor Challenge project crafted using HTML, SCSS, and vanilla JavaScript. Elevate productivity with this Pomodoro-inspired timer, perfect for focused work. Seamlessly switch between work and breaks, utilizing short and long break features. Optimize your workflow, achieve balance, and effortlessly boost productivity.
author: Carlos Simon Camacho
